name: Avoid Activities using "Group By" statement (TIBCO BW)
description: This metric retrieves the artifacts containing queries using the "Group By" statement.
output: This QR retrieves all the activies that use SQL statement with "Group By".
rationale: Having complex queries in Tibco Activities can cause performance problems. Queries using group by are considered complex and not efficient.
remediation: Review the design of the query to avoid if possible Group By clause
